data.eml:eml: Rheophilic water mites from southern Argentina, with the description of one new genus and three new species (Acari: Hydrachnidia)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Smit, Harry (2002): Rheophilic water mites from southern Argentina, with the description of one new genus and three new species (Acari: Hydrachnidia). Zootaxa 103: 1-23, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156012
